I saw a bright spirit light when I open this mail, Frank.  I lost  
satelli=
te last night, so I don't even have TV, got to wait until the end of this  =

week for them to come out here, only way I get news now is by going online=
  
here.  Have heard that because the earth has already rotated a 4 to 8  i=
nches 
or more from what they at NASA are saying now it might reason my TV =
 doesn't 
get the signal.  Between the last 3 big quakes, Chili, New Zeland=
,  and 
Japan, and the other quake over there on that Island near Japan it =
was a  
separate quake.  We are closer to the moon, then with that comet an=
d the x  
planet or whatever it has sped up time. sf
 
 
In a message dated=
 3/13/2011 3:35:02 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
SnowfireL@... writes:
=

 
 
 
Yep, they sure are, and here it is: 
 
_http://news.yahoo.com/s/ap/2=
0110313/ap_on_bi_ge/as_japan_earthquake_nuclear
_crisis_ 
(http://news.yaho=
o.com/s/ap/20110313/ap_on_bi_ge/as_japan_earthquake_nuclear_crisis) 
 
 
In=
 a message dated 3/13/2011 1:29:23 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
purplealie=
ngirl@... writes:

 
Might have gotten a warning the day before, but =
if ya don't know  what to 
listen for, it's missed, or it's created after t=
he fact.  Created as your own 
mind remaking the voices--not an attempt to =
deliberately  fake it.
 
 "They" seemed to be talking about wormwood in pre=
vious  recordings, well 
you probably heard that wormwood  translates to  C=
hernobyl(?) aka nuke melt 
down, maybe they reference japan nuke melt down =
 by metaphor? Yeah, it's a 
reach. I don't do puzzles, codes, and  metaphor=
 for a reason.
 
 ......debunker fodder.
 
F-S
